name: Ext_R4B_OperationOutcome_is_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.OperationOutcome.issue.code for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents OperationOutcome.issue.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/OperationOutcome|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Describes the type of the issue. The system that creates an OperationOutcome SHALL choose the most applicable code from the IssueType value set, and may additional provide its own code for the error in the details element.
element.comment: `OperationOutcome.issue.code` maps to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.code`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Describes the type of the issue. The system that creates an OperationOutcome SHALL choose the most applicable code from the IssueType value set, and may additional provide its own code for the error in the details element.
element.comment: `OperationOutcome.issue.code` maps to R4 `OperationOutcome.issue.code`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: A code that describes the type of issue.
